thi-ap38:12.4: rundhantaṃ → nudantaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed) | niddhantaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed), katapāpakaṃ → kammapāpakaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed)
thi-ap38:13.1: vuḍḍho daharo vā → yo vuḍḍho daharo vāpi (bj) | yo vuḍḍho daharo cāpi (sya1ed, sya2ed) | yo ca vuddho daharo vā (pts-vp-pli1ed)
thi-ap38:14.3: sutvā → ñatvā (bj), sa saṃviggo → susaṃviggo (sya1ed, sya2ed) | sasaṃviggo (pts-vp-pli1ed)
thi-ap38:16.1: tatonujānetvā → tato anumodetvā (bj) | tatonumodetvā (sya1ed, sya2ed) | tato 'numānetvā (pts-vp-pli1ed)
